name: Ketorolac
indications: Short-term management of moderate to severe pain.
pharmacology: Non-selective COX inhibitor reducing inflammation and pain.

name: Aloe Vera Gel
indications: Soothes dry and irritated skin.
pharmacology: Hydrates and reduces inflammation.
dosage: Apply to affected area 2-3 times daily.

name: Dextromethorphan Syrup
indications: Relieves cough due to throat irritation.
pharmacology: Suppresses cough reflex in the brain.

name: Vitamin C Tablets
indications: Boosts immunity and promotes skin health.
pharmacology: Antioxidant that neutralizes free radicals.

name: Bisoprolol
indications: Manages high blood pressure and heart failure.
pharmacology: Selective beta-blocker that reduces heart rate and output.

name: Glimepiride
indications: Controls blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Stimulates insulin release from pancreatic beta cells.

name: Zinc Syrup
indications: Supports growth and immunity in children.
pharmacology: Essential mineral for enzyme function and growth.

name: Timolol Eye Drops
indications: Reduces intraocular pressure in glaucoma.
pharmacology: Non-selective beta-blocker that reduces aqueous humor production.
dosage: 1 drop in affected eye twice daily.

name: Chlorhexidine Mouthwash
indications: Reduces plaque and oral bacteria.
pharmacology: Antimicrobial that disrupts bacterial membranes.

name: Fexofenadine
indications: Relieves symptoms of seasonal allergies.
pharmacology: H1 receptor antagonist that blocks histamine.
dosage: 60 mg twice daily or 120 mg once daily.

name: Codeine
indications: Relieves mild to moderate pain and suppresses cough.
pharmacology: Opioid receptor agonist in the CNS to reduce pain sensation.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream
indications: Relieves inflammation and itching due to eczema and dermatitis.
pharmacology: Corticosteroid reducing inflammation and immune response.
dosage: Apply thinly to the affected area 1-2 times daily.

name: Atorvastatin
indications: Lowers cholesterol and prevents cardiovascular disease.
pharmacology: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor that reduces cholesterol synthesis.

name: Metformin
indications: Controls blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Reduces hepatic glucose production and improves insulin sensitivity.

name: Paracetamol Syrup
indications: Relieves pain and reduces fever in children.
pharmacology: Inhibits prostaglandin synthesis in the CNS.

name: Loratadine
indications: Relieves symptoms of hay fever and chronic urticaria.
pharmacology: Non-drowsy H1 receptor antagonist that blocks histamine.

name: Vitamin D Capsules
indications: Supports bone health and calcium absorption.
pharmacology: Facilitates calcium and phosphorus homeostasis.

name: Phenylephrine
indications: Relieves nasal congestion in colds and allergies.
pharmacology: Alpha-adrenergic agonist causing nasal vasoconstriction.

name: Artificial Tears
indications: Relieves dry eye symptoms.
pharmacology: Lubricates the eye surface and reduces dryness.
dosage: 1-2 drops in each eye as needed.

name: Fluoride Toothpaste
indications: Prevents tooth decay and strengthens enamel.
pharmacology: Strengthens teeth and reduces cavity formation.
dosage: Use a pea-sized amount twice daily.
administration: Brush teeth for at least 2 minutes.

indications: Treats high blood pressure and angina.

indications: Reduces cholesterol levels and prevents heart diseases.

name: Metformin
indications: Controls blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Decreases glucose production in the liver and improves insulin sensitivity.

name: Insulin Glargine
indications: Long-acting insulin for type 1 and type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Regulates glucose metabolism by promoting glucose uptake.

name: Latanoprost Eye Drops
indications: Reduces intraocular pressure in glaucoma.
pharmacology: Prostaglandin analog that increases aqueous humor outflow.
dosage: 1 drop in affected eye daily at night.

name: Artificial Tears
indications: Relieves dryness and irritation in the eyes.
pharmacology: Lubricates and hydrates the ocular surface.
dosage: 1-2 drops in each eye as needed.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream
indications: Treats redness, swelling, and itching.
pharmacology: Corticosteroid that reduces inflammation by suppressing immune response.
dosage: Apply a thin layer to the affected area 1-2 times daily.
administration: Topical, on clean and dry skin.

name: Clindamycin Gel
indications: Treats acne and bacterial skin infections.
pharmacology: Inhibits bacterial protein synthesis.
dosage: Apply to affected area once daily.
administration: Topical, avoid eyes and mucous membranes.

name: Omega-3 Capsules
indications: Supports heart health and brain function.
pharmacology: Essential fatty acids that reduce inflammation.

name: Whitening Toothpaste
indications: Whitens teeth and removes surface stains.
pharmacology: Releases oxygen to remove stains.

name: Dextromethorphan
indications: Relieves dry cough by suppressing the cough reflex.
pharmacology: Acts on the cough center in the medulla oblongata.

name: Ambroxol
indications: Breaks down mucus and clears airways.
pharmacology: Increases mucociliary clearance by enhancing surfactant production.

name: Cetirizine
indications: Relieves allergic symptoms such as runny nose and itching.
pharmacology: H1 receptor antagonist that reduces allergic response.

name: Fexofenadine
indications: Treats seasonal allergic rhinitis and chronic urticaria.
pharmacology: Non-sedating antihistamine blocking H1 receptors.
administration: Take with water, not fruit juices.

name: Infant Multivitamins
indications: Provides essential vitamins for infants' growth and development.
pharmacology: Replenishes essential vitamins and supports overall health.

name: Paracetamol Suspension
indications: Relieves fever and pain in children.
pharmacology: Inhibits prostaglandin synthesis in the CNS.

name: Vitamin C
indications: Boosts immunity and promotes skin health.
pharmacology: Antioxidant that supports immune system function.

name: Vitamin D3
indications: Supports bone health and calcium absorption.
pharmacology: Enhances calcium and phosphate absorption from the gut.

name: Chlorhexidine Mouthwash
indications: Prevents oral infections and maintains oral hygiene.
pharmacology: Antimicrobial that reduces bacterial count in the oral cavity.

name: Fluoride Toothpaste
indications: Prevents dental cavities and strengthens teeth.
pharmacology: Inhibits demineralization and promotes remineralization of enamel.
dosage: Use a pea-sized amount twice daily.

name: Clobetasol
indications: Reduces inflammation and itching in skin conditions.
pharmacology: A corticosteroid that inhibits inflammatory cytokines.
dosage: Apply a thin layer to the affected area twice daily.

name: Mupirocin
indications: Used for bacterial skin infections.
pharmacology: Inhibits bacterial protein synthesis by binding to isoleucyl-tRNA synthetase.

name: Salicylic Acid
indications: Treats acne, warts, and psoriasis.
pharmacology: Keratolytic agent promoting exfoliation of skin cells.
dosage: Apply sparingly to affected areas once daily.

name: Amlodipine
indications: Used for hypertension and angina.
pharmacology: Calcium channel blocker that relaxes blood vessels.

name: Atorvastatin
indications: Lowers cholesterol and triglycerides.
pharmacology: Inhibits HMG-CoA reductase, reducing cholesterol synthesis.

name: Metformin
indications: Helps control blood sugar levels in Type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Decreases hepatic glucose production and improves insulin sensitivity.

name: Glimepiride
indications: Used to lower blood sugar in Type 2 diabetes.
pharmacology: Stimulates insulin secretion from pancreatic beta cells.

name: Artificial Tears
indications: Relieves dry and irritated eyes.
pharmacology: Lubricates and protects the ocular surface.

name: Brimonidine
indications: Used to treat glaucoma and ocular hypertension.
pharmacology: Alpha-2 adrenergic agonist that reduces intraocular pressure.
dosage: 1 drop in the affected eye twice daily.

name: Paracetamol
indications: Relieves pain and reduces fever.
pharmacology: Acts by inhibiting prostaglandin synthesis in the CNS.

name: Ibuprofen
indications: Relieves inflammation, pain, and fever.
pharmacology: Inhibits cyclooxygenase (COX-1 and COX-2).
dosage: As required, based on pain severity.
administration: Take with food to avoid stomach upset.

name: Diclofenac
indications: Treats pain and inflammation in musculoskeletal conditions.
pharmacology: Inhibits prostaglandin synthesis by blocking COX enzymes.

name: Naproxen
indications: Relieves pain and inflammation.
pharmacology: Non-selective inhibitor of COX enzymes.

name: Aspirin
indications: Treats pain, inflammation, and reduces clotting.
pharmacology: Inhibits platelet aggregation by irreversibly blocking COX-1.
dosage: Depends on condition; usually 81-325 mg daily.
administration: Oral, with a full glass of water.

name: Tramadol
indications: Used for moderate to severe pain.
pharmacology: Opioid analgesic acting on the CNS.
administration: Take orally with or without food.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream
indications: Treats inflammation and itching.
pharmacology: Reduces swelling, itching, and redness.

name: Aloe Vera Gel
indications: Moisturizes skin and soothes irritation.
pharmacology: Natural plant extract with hydrating properties.

name: Clotrimazole Cream
indications: Treats fungal skin infections.
pharmacology: Inhibits fungal cell membrane synthesis.

name: Sunscreen SPF 50
indications: Protects skin from UV radiation.
pharmacology: Reflects and absorbs UV rays.

name: Benzoyl Peroxide Gel
indications: Treats acne.
pharmacology: Reduces acne-causing bacteria.

name: Vitamin C Serum
indications: Brightens skin and reduces dark spots.
pharmacology: Powerful antioxidant and collagen booster.
